intro: Deanea, commonly known as the African violet, is a genus of flowering plants native to Africa. These plants are characterized by their vibrant, showy flowers and compact, bushy growth habit. Deanea species typically have thick, fleshy leaves that help them retain moisture in their native arid environments. The flowers are usually clustered in dense inflorescences and come in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, and white. They are popular as houseplants due to their ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
